    • Constructor Detail

      • Manoeuvre

        public Manoeuvre(Component[] components,
         java.lang.String olan,
         java.lang.String aresti,
         java.lang.String name,
         java.lang.String category,
         int[] groupIndicesPre,
         int[] groupIndicesPost)
          throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        components - - list of components which constitute the movement of the manoeuvre
        olan - - olan figure for the manoeuvre
        aresti - - the aresti catalogue reference for the manoeuvre
        name - - name of the manoeuvre
        category - - name of the category this manoeuvre falls into
        groupIndicesPre - - first group of indices of components which are scalable
        groupIndicesPost - - second group of indices of components which are scalable
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - - thrown if there's no components
